name: Project: mRNA-1273
description:
Started from Wuhan, China, Covid-19 has been a real threat for human race.

Today it has over 68 Millions positive cases, with 1.56 Million+ deaths.Making the whole world on hold. Covid -19 has marked 2020 as the darkest year of this era.

It's been a long time, But our Scientists, Doctors, Nurses kept fighting.

Because true heros are never done, until they save the world.

Recently Moderna announced that the primary efficacy analysis of the Phase 3 study of mRNA-1273 conducted on 196 cases confirms the high efficacy observed at the first interim analysis. The data analysis indicates a vaccine efficacy of 94.1%.

In this educational game, let's walk together to the very basic development process of mRNA-1273 (Covid-19 Vaccine)
